title: Leaving the EU doesn't mean we have to lose free trade and still keep the things that are important to us
text:
News Opinion Leaving the EU doesn't mean we have to lose free trade and still keep the things that are important to us Theresa May has triggered Article 50, which means the UK will start its formal process of leaving the EU Share Theresa May has triggered Article 50 (Photo: Getty) Share Get politics updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
We have formally notified the European Union that we are leaving . The Prime Minister said she wants a smooth and orderly process. 
It means that we will be taking control of our borders, our laws, our taxes and our trade relationships. It is what she called the things that matter most to us. 
There were a significant number of traditional Labour supporters who voted to leave the European Union . Many of them in our heartlands. 
They were the ones who experienced first hand some of the problems of free movement of labour, goods and capital, the things which define the single market. 
Their communities were harmed by employers who rather than train the local workforce would recruit from abroad. Read More Article 50 has shown Theresa May to be Mrs Frighteningly Confused of Downing Street in Parliament Gisela Stuart (Photo: Daily Mirror) 
We’ve failed if we don’t skill up the next generation, invest in infrastructure and reduce the inequalities between the regions of our nation. 
The decision to leave the EU is our opportunity for national renewal. We are a nation that exports many of its goods. 
By taking back control over our trade relationships we can once again be more outward looking. Australia wants to strike an early deal, so does Canada and the US. 
Given sufficient political will we can achieve free and frictionless trade with the EU whilst reaching out to others. 
As a Midlands MP I have seen successful companies like JCB who have shown that trade is global and what matters is continuous innovation and technical excellence. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
